Sentencas: In this work, for the first time, we systematically evaluated the temperature-dependent long-term stability of Na-doped SrSiO3 super ionic conductors.
Titulo: Temperature-dependent long-term stability of Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8 fast ion conductors

Sentencas: The total conductivity of the Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8(40SNS) was monitored in situ by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Temperature-dependent long-term stability of Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8 fast ion conductors

Sentencas: The conductivity of the 40SNS at 700 degrees C degraded within 1 h due to the crystallization of Na2Si2O5.
Titulo: Temperature-dependent long-term stability of Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8 fast ion conductors

Sentencas: However, at 450 degrees C, the initial conductivity of the 40SNS was firmly maintained for 260h without any observable phase transition.
Titulo: Temperature-dependent long-term stability of Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8 fast ion conductors

Sentencas: These results demonstrate the existence of a threshold temperature regime that suppresses the crystallization kinetics of the amorphous phase of Na-doped SrSiO3 materials.
Titulo: Temperature-dependent long-term stability of Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8 fast ion conductors
Temperature-dependent long-term stability of Sr0.6Na0.4SiO2.8 fast ion conductors
